events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred on Elm Street yesterday. My vehicle was hit at a stop sign.
The claim has been categorized as an auto accident involving a rear-end collision with another vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact moving forward.
Your auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now officially in processing status.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and any repair estimates related to the collision.
All requested documents including the police report, photos, and repair quotes have been submitted by the claimant.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence for your vehicle collision case.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been completed with all facts and liabilities clarified.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and damages has been proposed to resolve your auto accident claim.
Customer has responded with questions about the proposed settlement and requested clarification on coverage terms.
After review of the customer feedback, the claim approval has been finalized confirming the settlement amount.
The settlement payment for your car accident damages has been issued and should arrive within 5 business days.
Your auto accident claim case has been officially closed following successful settlement and payment issuance.
All records and communications related to your auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
